data.text: KYIV: Israel decided to evacuate its embassy and move its diplomats to an alternative office in Lviv amid growing concerns about an imminent Russian invasion of Ukraine,

“…Thanks to social media, Putin’s invasion of Ukraine in 2014 was a triumph of postmodern provocation. If you were on the left, you heard that Ukraine was Nazi; if you were on the right, you were told that it was gay; if you were on the far right, you were told…”
